programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw, a car enthusiast and TV presenter teams up with master mechanic Fuzz Townshend to rescue rusty old cars and classic vehicles from their former neglected lives. People can nominate a relative or friend without them knowing if they've been unable to restore the car themselves for any reason from medical issues to financial problems. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw, a car enthusiast and TV presenter teams up with master mechanic Fuzz Townshend to rescue rusty old cars and classic vehicles from their former neglected lives. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: King Fishers
programme.desc: In this humorous action packed international adventure we pitch three more fishermen, from three different countries against each other to discover who is the KINGFISHER. Theres fly fishing fanatic Abbie from Belize, taking on cheeky Irish beach fisherman Eugene and extreme ice angler Vidar from Sweden. In the tropical heat of Belize they fish for the hard fighting Bonefish, in the blustery wind and rain of Ireland its the European Bass and in the extreme cold of Sweden its the Arctic Char. But as always in King Fisher this competition isnt just about who catches the most and who catches the biggest, its also about who hosts the ultimate fishing trip. Will the warm paradise island in Belize and its beach party outscore the beauty of Ireland and its traditions and how will they fare against the winter wonderland and surprises of Sweden? The fishermen award each other extra marks for the overall experience they provide on their home territory, these points are added to their fishing scores and ultimately, one is crowned, King Fisher. Its a hard fought battle throughout, with underhand tactics, twists, turns and controversy, until finally the King Fisher is revealed.

programme.title: King Fishers
programme.desc: Sean, a fog-horn voiced sea-skipper from Cape Town takes on Steve, a cheekily charming match fishing champion from England and Mary, a super-competitive sea fishing captain from the West of Ireland. The targeted species range from Yellowfin and Longfin Tuna in South Africa, to tiny freshwater Coarse fish in England, and to the huge Common Skate in Ireland. But this competition isnt just about who catches the most fish, its about who hosts the ultimate overall fishing trip. Will the excitement of fishing the vast tuna shoals of the Atlantic outscore the very English experience of Match fishing on the Serpentine lakes of Patshull Hall? Or will they be bowled over by the beautiful scenery and quirky hospitality in Ireland, the country that prides itself on offering guests not one, but céad mile (a hundred thousand) welcomes?

programme.title: Construction Zone
programme.desc: Dateline 1987. Thousands of workers go into action. Their task: to build the world's longest undersea railway tunnel in one of the world's most hostile environments. The Channel Tunnel is an engineering marvel. Yet in the face of financial meltdown; an epic battle with flood; and a near fatal fire, the Tunnel's story is a hard won triumph.

programme.title: Construction Zone
programme.desc: The world is desperate for oil and gas. But dwindling energy supplies are forcing oil rigs to drill in some of the harshest environments on the globe. It takes a Megastructure oil rig, like the Noble Piet, to withstand the fury of nature and keep on drilling. Follow a skilled team of roughnecks as they battle the elements of the North Sea in pursuit of an untapped reservoir of natural gas worth 350 million dollars. But there's a shortage of oil rigs like the Noble Piet. So the Keppel FELS shipyard in Singapore is designing and building an impressive of 23 rigs at once. Can this shipyard build rigs fast enough to keep up with exploding demand and tough enough to endure the punishment of drilling in the open sea?

programme.title: Filthy Riches
programme.desc: In Filthy Riches, travel across America to find industrious and ingenious people who prove they're not afraid to roll up their sleeves and get their hands dirty. Whether catching eels on the Delaware River, hunting ginseng in Appalachia, digging for bloodworms in the mudflats of Maine, harvesting wood burls in the west, or scouring forests for edible mushrooms, one thing is constant: these mavericks must rely on their own strength and determination to forge a living.

programme.title: Big, Bigger, Biggest
programme.desc: Through the rainforests of Central America stretches one of the biggest manmade marvels on the planet, the Panama Canal. A colossal engineering project aims to double the canal's capacity, almost a century after it was inaugurated. The Panama Canal owes its success to four key inventions found in a series of landmark canals. At the heart of each lies a major technological breakthrough that allows ever bigger ships to navigate landlocked areas. one by one travelling up the scale, we'll reveal the incredible stories behind these structures, and the inventions that allowed each one to carry tonnes more cargo than the last -- four ingenious leaps forward, from big, to bigger, into the Americas' biggest.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz take on the restoration of a lightweight British pocket rocket , a 1997 Lotus Elise. The car's owner, 44 year old former print manager Sarah, had been planning to get the car back on the road with the help of her dad Phil until double tragedy struck – he fell victim to incurable bowel cancer then sadly Sarah herself was also diagnosed with cancer. The car's restoration was put on hold. Mother Jenny wrote in to Car SOS hoping to bring back her daughter's much needed smile.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Making motoring dreams come true for a fifth season Car SOS is back, and this time it's bigger and better than ever. Everyone's favourite petrol heads Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw continue their mission to seek out classic cars with deserving owners. Using all their guile and restoration knowledge their aim is to sneak away clapped out classics without their owners knowing then in a blizzard of grease and grime and hard graft get the much loved motors back where they deserve to be, on the road. In this series the boys take on their biggest challenges ever. Chronic rust, hard to find parts and broken engines test the boys to their limits. British classics, Italian roadsters, German grand tourers and French hot hatches from across seven decades of motoring history make the most astonishing line-up Car SOS has ever had, and, for their lucky owners the surprise they will never forget.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: North vs. South
programme.desc: When a new fleet of Southern boats arrive in the Outer Banks, the Gloucester crews face their stiffest competition yet. The new contenders include a bug exterminator-turned captain, a young rookie team in a tiny fishing console, an old familiar face with a new boat and a fishing family on a slow but dangerous vessel. The Northern and Southern crews battle it out, bluefin-for-bluefin, on the treacherous seas of the Outer Banks until a new and surprising victor emerges.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the 'Curse of the Afterlife'. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: King Fishers
programme.desc: In this humorous action packed international adventure we pitch three more fishermen, from three different countries against each other to discover who is the KINGFISHER. Theres fly fishing fanatic Abbie from Belize, taking on cheeky Irish beach fisherman Eugene and extreme ice angler Vidar from Sweden. In the tropical heat of Belize they fish for the hard fighting Bonefish, in the blustery wind and rain of Ireland its the European Bass and in the extreme cold of Sweden its the Arctic Char. programme.title: Zeb's Big Fish
programme.desc: Biologist and avid explorer Zeb Hogan travels far and wide to find the largest fish on our planet in this fascinating documentary series. His travels take him to contrasting locations and extreme environments across the globe, plunging himself into the depths of our seas, oceans, lakes and rivers to examine these giant fish species. He hopes to highlight the growing issues surrounding the depletion of many different species of fish, and to show that change needs to be instigated. From vampire fish to giant killer catfish, each episode follows Zeb as he attempts to locate a unique species.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: In 1999, heartbroken Londoner Clare Matthews decides to travel to Goa, India. She loves it so much that when her money runs out, she overcomes her initial fears and hides 2 pounds of hashish in a statue, mailing it off to Europe to make some quick cash. But her party lifestyle spirals out of control, and she needs more money. She ships another parcel, and then another-but the third one doesn't reach Europe. The courier company says they've lost the address and ask her to go to the post office to pick up a fax. Desperate for money but suspecting a trap, Clare reluctantly picks up the fax. She's arrested and ends up spending years in one of Asia's largest jails, waiting trial. Finally, she's given a 5 year sentence which she's already served. But just after she's released, Clare's lawyer tells her that her sentence has been extended for another 5 years. Devastated, Clare waits in jail for 3 months until the judge relents and allows her to return to London.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: At Jorge Chavez International Airport in Lima, Peru, security personnel work to stop the flow of drugs out of the country. A divorced couple denies traveling together, but carry identical bags filled with cocaine. A bag containing a white powder tests negative for cocaine, and police decide to dig deeper. A suspect hides cocaine in the handles of his carry-on. A man is found with over 35 capsules of cocaine in his belly.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Egypt from Above
programme.desc: This fascinating documentary series which through aerial journey shows the entire spectacular country of Egypt, revealing how the nation of today was born from its dramatic past. The series will show from above how Egypt's harsh terrain has always been a huge challenge for those who live here. Airborne cameras will capture what it is like to exist in the sand dunes and how the mighty Nile is the life-line of the entire country, uncovering the secrets of the mighty pharaohs and their incredible engineering achievements such as the pyramids and the Valley of the Kings. But the audience will also have a chance to see how today's Egyptians are building on the legacy of their ancestors with amazing projects that include a new and modern capital city and world class tourist resorts.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Night Shift follows the unsung culinary heroes who work through the night to create palette pleasing eats and over-the-top custom orders on time. A Toronto team prepares thousands of nutritious meals every night for preschoolers across the city. But with rigorous health regulations and their clients' picky palettes in mind, an over-spiced kettle of soup has the chefs heading back to the cutting board just hours before delivery. Meanwhile, it's Sunday at 2 a.m. and the team at Homestyle Desserts Bakery is rolling up their sleeves. Their mission is to prepare enough carrot cake for hundreds of hungry passengers on board a New York City brunch cruise. But when their order suddenly doubles, they find themselves seriously short on carrots and at risk of missing the boat.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Night Shift follows the unsung culinary heroes who work through the night to create palette pleasing eats and over-the-top custom orders on time. After last year's second-place finish, a team of Ohio taco artists is determined to win the grand prize at the annual gourmet food truck competition. For starters, they'll need enough grub to feed nearly a thousand people. And even though they hit the ground running, an early setback puts their mobile restaurant in the fast lane. Meanwhile, when a prestigious ladies' golf club orders a signature dessert, it's up to a skilled team of Toronto bakers to make it happen. Their complex creation includes edible pearls, a dramatic swirl of chocolate, and a French pastry that's nearly impossible to perfect. But even with all hands on deck, a blunder at 3 a.m. could cause a catastrophic meltdown.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route to Salt Lake City, Delta Airlines Flight 1141 crashes just moments after lifting off from Dallas-Fort Worth airport and erupts into flames. Of the 108 people on board, 94 make it off the plane alive while 14 die trying to escape the smoke and flames. It's clear that neither the runway nor the weather is to blame, so investigators know there's a problem with either the plane itself or its configuration.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This American anthology period drama series is designed so that in each season the audience is introduced to a different iconic person who made a huge impact to the world and follows their life stories. The first season follows turbulent journey of the physicist who would grow to become the icon- Albert Einstein. Second season returns to explore the turbulent life of the 20th century's most controversial artist, Pablo Picasso and the subject of the third season will be American singer Aretha Franklin, known as "The Queen of Soul". This amazing series will change the way we see this incredible people, portrayed by famous actors, as we follow them through childhood to great discoveries, epic loves, complicated relationships, causes and their flaws.

programme.title: Genius

programme.title: 1989: The Year That Made Us
programme.desc: What do Bart Simpson, Batman and the Little Mermaid have in common? They all became huge stars in 1989, a year that shaped Hollywood as we know it today. In this episode of Nat Geo's 6-part series, television ad film icons James Brooks and Peter Guber peel back the curtain on the world of entertainment. They reveal how the overnight success of these three characters turned the old show business into the multifaceted modern industry it is today.

programme.title: 1989: The Year That Made Us
programme.desc: Chuck D and Arsenio Hall discuss the pop culture revolution of 1989 that raised our collective social consciousness. Spike Lee's powerful film Do the Right Thing made a lasting impact, Public Enemy's provocative lyrics transformed Hip Hop and Arsenio Hall created a platform for a generation of stars previously ignored by late night TV. The cultural and political events of the year helped awaken mainstream audiences to the black experience.

programme.title: Latin American Hot Borders
programme.desc: At the José María Córdova International Airport in Colombia, customs agents are always on alert for organized crime activity. After a luggage scanner detects illicit material inside a suitcase, agents find a large quantity of money being carried into the country by someone most likely hired by drug traffickers. Meanwhile, on the Rumichaca International Bridge between Colombia and Ecuador, agents discover a Colombian man with a large quantity of illegal goods. When questioned by the authorities, he blames his own mother.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: 44 Cats

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: In Blue's Clues & You, beloved puppy Blue invites viewers to join her and Josh on a clue-led adventure to solve a puzzle. With each paw print, the viewer is inspired to interact with Josh and Blue to figure out Blue's Clues!

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Barbapapa – One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: PAW Patrol is a preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Zuma, Rubble, and Skye, who are led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. With a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles and lots of cute doggy humor, the PAW Patrol works together on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.From Marshall the firedog to Chase the police pup to Skye, who flies high in her copter, each pup brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. They all have special Pup Packs on their backs to help them handle anything – from rescuing kittens to saving a train from a rockslide! And no matter how big the adventure, the PAW Patrol always has time for a game, a laugh, and an ear scratch from Ryder.Fun PAW Patrol Fact: Ryder rescued all the pups and taught them their PAW Patrol skills.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Every April Fool's Day, Luan pranks the entire household, but this year, Lincoln has a plan to not get pranked. The Loud kids make a trip to the supermarket to do the grocery shopping for Mom, but Lincoln has other plans.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Lincoln's mom signs him up for peewee football, Lincoln schemes to have Lynn take his spot. After Lucy reads Lincoln's fortune and claims his day will "end in disaster", Lincoln becomes a hypochondriac.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: LEGO City Adventures is a character-driven series of funny, smart, kinetic slices of life that explores the misadventures of a community of unique characters. A rollercoaster ride of fun, humor and action make this a boundless series of silliness!

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After agreeing to go to The Royal Woods House of Terror, Linc and Clyde have to toughen up and face their fears. Lola discovers Lucy has an old, fragile doll and decides she must borrow it – no matter what Lucy says.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn are quadruplets with only two things in common: their birthday and parents. This dynamic foursome battle sibling rivalry at every turn, but in the end when they are together, nothing can stop them.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad meet an impressive family they worry their kids aren't doing enough to ensure successful futures. Tired of Lynn's poor sportsmanship during board games, the siblings decide to team up to take her down.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Just Add Magic
programme.desc: The girls have their first interaction with Chuck, but he doesn't remember anything about the Pluot Festival in 1965. The girls cook a trust spell that helps Chuck adjust to the modern day – but it also unlocks some of his memories from 1965.

programme.desc: 14 yr old Goldie's life is turned upside down when her family moves in with her Grandpa Maury and his three 70 something, totally bonkers housemates. Goldie's landed herself the ultimate insta-family!...If she can keep everyone together.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: Pielaiko telpu, māju, dārzu
programme.desc: Vērtīgu padomu un ideju raidījums, kurā tiek apskatītas visdažādākās tēmas, kas saistītas ar dzīvokļa, balkona, mājas, piemājas teritorijas un dārza labiekārtošanu, apzaļumošanu, dizainu. Raidījuma mērķis ir iedvesmot un uzrunāt ikvienu, kas vēlas uzlabot dzīves kvalitāti, mudinot uz rīcību.

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Raidījuma vadītājs Māris Olte tiksies ar dažādām personībām, lai kliedētu mītus un izzinātu videi draudzīgus meža apsaimniekošanas principus, kā arī aktualizēs dabas vēsturiskā mantojuma varenību.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas 19.00
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos – ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Aktuāli šodien un rīt
programme.desc: 7.epizode. Mazie un vidējie uzņēmumi – kāda ir to nākotne Latvijā? Raidījuma vadītāja Anda Pēkšēna, kurai ir 20 gadu vadības pieredze uzņēmējdarbībā, kopā ar dažādu nozaru ekspertiem un prasmju treneriem sniegs skaidru redzējumu mazo un vidējo uzņēmumu vadītājiem: kā saglabāt biznesu šodien, kā pastāvēt rīt, kā šodien ir jāmaina komunikācijas veids ar patērētāju, kā vadīt komandu, esošās izmaiņas nodokļu segmentā un citi svarīgi jautājumi, kas ir nozīmīgi ikvienam uzņēmējam.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas 21.00
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos – ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Pasaka par tukšo telpu
programme.desc: Kristas Burānes dokumentāla pasaka par to, kā izcilais Eiropas scenogrāfs un pasniedzējs Andris Freibergs meklē tukšo telpu. Andris Freibergs savu pašportretu rada uz skatuves kā izrādes "Andris Freibergs" scenogrāfiju. Viņš izspēlē sevi kā vietu, kurā gandrīz astoņdesmit gadus ir bijis laiks spožiem panākumiem, traģiskiem zaudējumiem, dzimšanai, nāvei un sapnim par ideālās tukšās telpas radīšanu, kura sevī ietvertu vienlaicīgi visu un neko, galu un sākumu.

programme.title: Jautā – Jums
programme.desc: Atkārtojums. Raidījumu "Jautā-Jums" skaties katru darba dienu plkst. 16.00. Raidījumu vada Lauris Kļaviņš.

programme.title: Шефы
programme.desc: Мини-сериал рассказывает о шеф-поваре знаменитого французского заведения, готовом пойти на всё ради спасения собственного ресторана. А также, о его отношениях с другими людьми, в полностью неполиткорректном мире…

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Свет одновременно материален и нематериален. Вечность – главная особенность света. Фотонам не свойственно стареть. Свет от далеких звезд идет до Земли миллионы лет и приходит неизменным. Человек видит окружающие предметы исключительно благодаря фотонам. Проведенные исследования породили еще одну версию возникновение мира, согласно которой мир создан из света и может быть вновь обращен в свет. Об этом и многом другом расскажет Документальный проект.

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Персонажами шоу становятся обычные врачи и больные, ГАИшники и нарушители, родители и дети, полицейские и хулиганы, пилоты и стюардессы, офисные работники и даже стриптизёрши.

programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Гроздья винограда
programme.desc: Это история любви и дружбы, которая начинается в 1953 году и продолжается 30 лет. Она происходит на фоне истории страны, перипетий колхоза, выращивающего виноград, и жизни донской казачьей станицы. Правительство, обеспокоенное процветанием в стране алкоголизма, решает ввести "сухой закон". Но даже этого им кажется ничтожно мало. И тогда верховная власть постановляет: вырубить виноградные плантации, чтобы свести к минимуму производство спиртной продукции. Уничтожаются виноградники, из-за чего страдает не только природа, но и люди. Казаки, которые существовали за счет выращивания фруктов и виноделия, решают противостоять власти и бороться за любимое дело всеми возможными способами.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. programme.title: Онлайн
programme.desc: Типичную "блондинку" Лену в жизни устраивает абсолютно все: муж, находящийся на заработках в Португалии, все также позволяет тратить ей деньги и уже перестал пытаться тщетно ее контролировать и дал полную свободу действий. Поэтому, не теряя возможностей, все время Лена проводит с пользой и "по-максимуму" — тратит еще больше денег, смотрит еще больше видео, постит еще больше постов, френдит еще больше людей в соц.сетях и еще больше веселит зрителя, так как комичных ситуаций в ее жизни только прибавляется. Бедный ее муж Витя!

programme.title: Детективы
programme.desc: Два полицейских в отставке открывают частное детективное агентство... Майоры полиции Игорь Лукин и Алексей Насонов вышли в отставку, но не собираются сидеть без дела. Они открывают частное детективное агентство "Детективы" и берутся за дела тех, кто по разным причинам не хочет обращаться в полицию… Опыт и профессиональные навыки Лукина и Насонова позволяют им с одинаковым успехом и решать семейные конфликты, и раскрывать уголовные преступления.

programme.title: Береговая охрана
programme.desc: рассказывает о жизни пограничного российского городка и непростой службе офицеров Береговой охраны ФСБ РФ. Андрей Васильков по распределению прибывает в Ушаков. Позади – пять лет в военно-морском институте, впереди – служба в береговой охране. Но вместо ожидаемых Васильковым романтики, приключений, опасностей и пороха, он получил каждодневную рутину. А еще – излишнюю самоуверенность, разгильдяйство, предательства, разочарования, настоящую мужскую дружбу, любовь к женщине, подвиги, героизм, взросление… И, как выяснилось, любовь к Родине. Потому что "есть такая профессия – Родину защищать".

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. programme.title: Брат за брата
programme.desc: Такие кварталы, как Гарлем, раньше можно было увидеть только в голливудских боевиках. Никто не думал, что они могут появиться и у нас. Гарлем – настоящее гетто в одном из крупных российских городов. Здесь почти открыто торгуют наркотиками и перепродают краденое. Школьные учителя боятся своих учеников, ведь те способны убить за плохую оценку.

programme.title: Vēlais ar Streipu
programme.desc: Ikdienas satīrisko ziņu vakara šovs ar Kārli Streipu, kurā tiek apskatītas un analizētas dažādas sabiedrībā aktuālas tēmas.

programme.desc: Raidījumā katru darba dienu tiek apkopotas svarīgākās dienas tēmas un komentētas kopā ar raidījuma vadītāju un dienas viesi.

programme.title: Vēlais ar Streipu
programme.desc: Ikdienas satīrisko ziņu vakara šovs ar Kārli Streipu, kurā tiek apskatītas un analizētas dažādas sabiedrībā aktuālas tēmas.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Strange Creatures is a documentary series dedicated to the majestic Animal Kingdom and its weirdest, most unusual creatures. Nature never stops surprising us with its unique species and evolutionary unlike living things. Have a look at species with extraordinary survival skills, animals who camouflage in a skillful way for different reasons, creatures that convincingly play dead, find out if a grasshopper can vomit. These and much more amazing facts about animals are there for you in Strange Creatures.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: The Big Feed
programme.desc: The Big Feed is an educational documentary that looks at all our favourite animals, studying the way that they eat. The show goes behind the scenes of the world's most famous zoos to explore how they perform the gargantuan task of feeding thousands of animals everyday. From big cats to aquatic animals, and panda bears to meerkats, each animal has to be carefully catered for, with consideration to their nutritional needs and taste preferences. The big feed is like trying to feed an entire city everyday.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler is an American television personality, author, science teacher and the host of Xploration DIY SCI show. Each episode is about a certain science concept strengthened by science experiments, so that theory and practice are integrated. Steve conducts his fun experiments using everyday items everybody can get, so anyone can be a scientist. Watch, have fun and learn about the power of pressure, power of gas, laws of inertia, how to make elephant toothpaste at home and much more.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Danger! Wild Animals
programme.desc: Take a safari through the wilderness, visiting wildlife reserves, zoos and exotic locations that are home to some of the world's most interesting and dangerous species. Whether its an ostrich egg hatching or turtle being release into the wild, a rhino being weaned or an elephant being rescued from deadly minefields in Africa, this fast paced series uses some breathe taking footage. If that wasn't enough to capture your interest, it even takes a trip to some of the world's best breeding for conservation programs, encountering some adorable zoo babies.

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: We're Talking Animals
programme.desc: We're Talking Animals is a children's television series that provides eye opening and jaw dropping facts about all kinds of wildlife and farm animals. Accompanied by some stunning photography and footage of the animals in question. With hilarious asides from the animals themselves, this animal knowledge is coming straight from the horses mouth. Solidifying everything the episode has taught, MC Spider hosts an informative quiz about each segment the show has covered, finding the answers deep in his trusty web. This interactive extra keeps the show super engaging and fun.

programme.title: All Over The Workplace
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. Whether you want to join the police or write your first novel as an author, or cook sumptuous dishes as a chef, make people laugh as a comedian, wow the crowds as a footballer or even govern the country as a politician, this series sets out to discover just what it takes!

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Time-travelling and educational fun for kids. Andy works at the National Museum where he's responsible for the prehistoric exhibitions. He needs plenty of interesting items for his displays like dinosaur bones, feathers and things. Luckily for Andy, he has a time machine which means he can pop back to the prehistoric era, like the ice-age or the time of the dinosaurs and collect what he needs. Join Andy on his adventures back in time and learn about the creatures and beasts that lived on Earth millions of years ago. Starring Andy Day.
